pr_title: Mark API's classes final, caveat a bit of duplicate code

timeline.message:
Mark API's classes final, caveat a bit of duplicate code

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>

timeline.author: Oberon00

replies.bodyText: Is not public, see does not work with c-style comments
replies.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: You may as well add javadoc to a non-public method. It is clickable in IntelliJ at least 😃
replies.author: Oberon00

replies.bodyText: I may, but also this is the new common pattern used everywhere, and we don't do the same thing everywhere :))
replies.author: bogdandrutu

timeline.bodyText:
I think this change is unrelated and should not be in this PR.
Also, the ClassCastException may actually be more informative (although not necessarily more clear to the user).
timeline.author: Oberon00

timeline.bodyText: I'm surprised. Why is it possible to remove this cast here?
timeline.author: Oberon00

replies.bodyText: This PR changes the unobfuscate() method to return an SdkTracerProvider, rather than just TracerProvider
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: yes :) because now I can enforce that Builder only accepts SDK instances :)
replies.author: bogdandrutu

timeline.author: Oberon00

timeline.bodyText: @trask @anuraaga does this have any implications for the agent's usage of the obfuscated pattern?
timeline.author: jkwatson
